column4: Hey where do I lodge a minor complaint with serpentine cd burner?
you make a great straight man, but this is a family channel  :)
what do you mean? I want to know how I can get the teminal font for windows. It's not in msttfcore fonts
oh, I thought you wanted to change the fonts in the terminal window
with one of the font servers you can use the windows fonts directly
Use directly? Don't you mean get?
no, I mean you can put the windows font files onto your box and the font server will render them properly in X
do you mean, how do you know what font windows is using?
you should be able to set the font for an app, then read the font spec out of the registry
you have to extract all the files from the .iso into a tree, make the changes you want in that tree, then use mkisofs to create a new iso.
tree.  that means all files and directories from some location.
it looks like all the info I need is from the synopsis. Is that correct?
